Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • WTI Crude Oil shows hedgers consistently holding net short positions, initially deep short. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
  • Crude oil price fluctuated from $72.95 to $72.50 between August and November 2025. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
  • Hedgers indicate the most extreme positioning, particularly being `Hedgers_Deep_Short` through early September and mid-November. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]

Technical Summary:

  • Neither speculators nor hedgers exhibit extreme positioning stretch, with z-scores remaining within +/-2. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
  • No active crowding, squeeze, or exhaustion risks are indicated by current flags. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
  • Four-week flow shifted from long reduction to a consistent long build, suggesting hedgers were covering short positions. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
  • The `reversal_score` consistently reports zero, implying no clear tactical reversal signals. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]

References:

  • `oil_CoT_Signals` data, WTI FINANCIAL CRUDE OIL, latest Report_Date: 2025-11-18. [Source: Crude_Oil_CoT_Signals.html]
